backend/main.mo: Actor defining IDs, access control, user profiles, and typed records for cashflow, properties, loans, and wealth inputs with ownership and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Version 11 changes to files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing styling, routing, PWA behavior, storage, and component logic across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the app root and main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/offline-bundle/bundle.config.js: Configuration for building the Windows offline ZIP including version, output name, and metadata.
frontend/offline-bundle/create-windows-o: Creates a versioned Windows offline ZIP bundle by validating build output and packaging it with archiver.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.txt: User guide for the Windows offline bundle describing Version 11 contents, usage, and features.
frontend/offline-bundle/start-server-win: Batch script that checks for Node.js and starts a local server to run the offline app on Windows.
PowerShell launcher that checks for Node.js or Python and starts a local server for the offline app.
frontend/offline-bundle/WINDOWS_RUN_INST: Detailed setup and troubleshooting instructions for running the offline Windows bundle via local server.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, network-first navigation, and cache-first asset fetching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that sets up routing, query client, theming, service worker registration, and layout guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Placeholder auth wrapper that simply renders its children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Stub login button component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting users to save a name profile using React Query and local storage utilities.
Top-level UI layout with header, navigation, footer, mobile menu, and service worker update notice.
frontend/src/components/navigation/NavLi: Renders navigation links with icons and highlights the active route using router state.
frontend/src/components/pwa/ServiceWorke: Shows a popup when a service worker update is available and offers a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/storage/IndexedD: Checks IndexedDB availability and either renders children or displays error guidance if unavailable.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, summarizing, creating, updating, and deleting cashflow entries.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/component: Displays a table of cashflow entries with edit and delete actions and confirmation dialog.
Form card for adding or editing a cashflow entry with validation and mutation handling.
Shows summary cards for total to collect, total to give, and net balance with styled metrics.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/api.ts: React Query hook for generating the daily profit/loss report with error handling.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/component: Renders a sortable daily P/L table showing collected, given, and net values per day.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/api.ts: Fetches dashboard aggregates including net worth, property value, lending data, and calculates monthly cash flow.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Displays a KPI card showing formatted monthly cash flow from interest income.
Renders buttons for quick navigation to lending and property creation pages.
Displays a donut chart of asset allocation or a placeholder when no data exists.
frontend/src/features/lending/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, creating/updating, and deleting loans with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/lending/components: Generates charts showing monthly interest income and principal vs interest distribution for loans.
Form card for adding or editing a loan with validation, submission, and reset behavior.
Displays a table of loans with actions for editing, deleting, and viewing computed totals.
frontend/src/features/mpl/api.ts: React Query hooks for MPL matches, entries, P/L summary, and settlement with robust error handling and invalidation.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Cre: Dialog component for creating a match with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Ent: Displays betting entries in a table with loading and empty states.
Form card for adding a new betting entry to a match with input validation and mutation.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Mat: Shows match details, P/L summary, entries list, and settlement actions.
Lists all matches with status indicators and selection handling.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Set: Dialog for selecting a winning team and settling a match.
frontend/src/features/mpl/utils/pl.ts: Utility functions for calculating team P/L and opposite P/L for entries.
frontend/src/features/networth/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, updating, and aggregating wealth input and net worth data.
frontend/src/features/networth/component: Renders a grid of summary cards showing net worth metrics with icons, gradients, and formatted INR values.
Form card for entering and updating wealth inputs, prefilled from latest data and saved via mutation with validation.
frontend/src/features/properties/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, add/update, and delete properties with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/properties/compone: Displays a grid of property cards with details, edit/delete actions, and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
Form card for creating or editing a property, including validation, date conversion, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and controlling AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CashflowPage.tsx: Displays cashflow summary, entry form, and entries table with edit support.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProfitLossPage.t: Generates and displays daily profit/loss totals and a daily breakdown table.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutiveDashboardPag: Shows dashboard overview including monthly cashflow KPIs, quick actions, and wealth distribution.
frontend/src/pages/MatchProfitLossPage.t: Lists matches and shows match-level profit/loss details with create and view flows.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyLendingPage.tsx: Manages loans with a form, loans table, and lending insights visualization.
frontend/src/pages/NetWorthPage.tsx: Displays net worth summary and provides a form for managing wealth inputs.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyLedgerPage.ts: Manages properties with a form and property grid, showing portfolio details.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates, and exposes update activation.
React hook that signals when a service worker update is available and applies it.
frontend/src/queryInvalidation.ts: Provides helper functions to invalidate react-query caches for various domains.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured react-query keys for all data domains in the app.
frontend/src/routes/paths.ts: Centralized constants for app route paths.
frontend/src/storage/aggregates.ts: Computes aggregate values like property total, lending total, wealth inputs, and net worth.
frontend/src/storage/cashflowRepo.ts: CRUD operations for cashflow entries in IndexedDB and summary calculation.
frontend/src/storage/dailyPl.ts: Generates daily profit/loss summaries by grouping cashflow entries by day and computing totals.
frontend/src/storage/ids.ts: Implements auto-incrementing bigint IDs using an IndexedDB counters store.
frontend/src/storage/indexedDb.ts: Initializes and manages the app's IndexedDB schema and provides helpers for reading and writing object stores.
frontend/src/storage/loansRepo.ts: CRUD utilities for loans, including ID generation, timestamping, and bigint deserialization.
frontend/src/storage/mplPlSummary.ts: Computes strong/weak PL and final score for a match based on betting entries.
frontend/src/storage/mplRepo.ts: Manages matches and betting entries with creation, lookup, and settlement logic using IndexedDB.
frontend/src/storage/profile.ts: Stores and retrieves a simple user profile record from IndexedDB.
frontend/src/storage/propertiesRepo.ts: CRUD operations for properties with bigint fields and timestamp handling.
frontend/src/storage/timestamps.ts: Provides a microsecond-precision bigint timestamp generator.
frontend/src/storage/wealthInputsRepo.ts: CRUD functions for wealth input records using IndexedDB and autogenerated IDs.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numbers into INR currency strings using Indian locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/storageErrors.ts: Maps storage-related errors to user-friendly messages and logs detailed error info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and removing URL and session parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette, animations, fonts, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the Windows-downloadable offline portal build.
